if h : i < ctx.paramDecls.size then
      let d := ctx.paramDecls[i]
      d.2.isExplicit
    else
      false
private def getNextParam (ctx : Context) : (Name × BinderInfo) × Context :=
  let i := ctx.paramDeclIdx
  let d := ctx.paramDecls[i]!
  (d, { ctx with paramDeclIdx := ctx.paramDeclIdx + 1 }
